overview: Edinburgh Comedy Award nominees and hot virgins Lazy Susan present an hour of laidback, inventive sketch comedy. Some of it is about what it means to be a woman these days and some of it is about dogs etc. As seen in The Mash Report (BBC2), This Country (BBC3), The Windsors (Ch4) and in their self-titled sketch show Lazy Susan (BBC3).
title: Lazy Susan: Forgive Me, Mother!
